name: Blasting Cap: Gunpowder Heart
description:
Current version: 1.0.8.0

WASD - Movement K - Jump J - Shoot

Blasting Cap is a 2D platform-shooter. Try to reach the top of the ancient tower, and not to blow up in the process!

Face multiple enemies and platforming courses, fight a boss and collect each level's cristal!

Music by Tim Day!. Follow him on Bandcamp: https://timday.bandcamp.com/releases
